description: Our protaganist and artist
Karen's older brother
Mother of Karen and Deeze
Father of Karen and Deeze; he's out of the picture for most of the book and we only hear about him through his veiled threats to invoke his 'parental rights.'
Holocaust survivor who lives above the Reyes family. She is murdered early on in the book and Karen is invested in solving her murder.
Anka's husband
Anka's cat
Criminal and landlord of the Reyes family; husband to Sylvia. He goes to jail during the course of the book.
Jack's wife who is having an affair with Deeze
Ventriloquist who lives in the same building as the Reyes family; he disappears partway through the book.
Previously was a blood sister to Karen and shared her interest in monster movies, but has since moved on and frequently picks on Karen.
Boy with scars
Likely an imaginary friend of Karen's who fills the void left by Missy
One of four boys who attacks Karen

Deeze's friend and owner of Ray the rabbit
Jeffrey's rabbit who the Reyes pet sit for a bit
Artist admired by Deeze; also one of the sources of his full name
Mexican Revolutionary who Deeze is named after
First female detective; Karen 'meets' her in the cemetery
